name: Sonr
tagline: A dead simple to see who is on your network.
body:
### Sonr

The simplest way to know who is on your network.
Using [libtins](http://libtins.github.io/) as a packet sniffer, then feeding the extracted data to [websocketpp](https://github.com/zaphoyd/websocketpp) to connect to the react UI.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
